original_format.sentence: Patient experienced mild nausea and dizziness after taking ibuprofen for headache relief. Symptoms resolved within 2 hours.
Patient has been taking lisinopril for 6 months with excellent blood pressure control. No adverse effects reported.
Severe allergic reaction developed within 30 minutes of penicillin injection. Patient experienced difficulty breathing, hives, and required emergency treatment.
